localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
blogPost.body: Splitsub is a group buying app for online consumer subscriptions in India. Users share more than 25 different types of subscriptions ranging from streaming services to productivity softwares
blogPost.title: Splitsub - Group buying app for online subscriptions
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Splitsub是印度一款在线消费订阅的团购应用。用户分享超过25种不同类型的订阅，从流媒体服务到生产力软件。
Splitsub是印度一款在線消費訂閱的團購應用。用戶分享超過25種不同類型的訂閱，從流媒體服務到生產力軟件。

previous.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
previous.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients

localize.description: Zealth正在打造一款软件，帮助医院为癌症患者提供连续的全天候监测，一旦患者离开医院，如果患者处于高危状态，就会发出警报。
Zealth正在打造一款軟件，幫助醫院爲癌症患者提供連續的全天候監測，一旦患者離開醫院，如果患者處於高危狀態，就會發出警報。

next.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
next.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS

localize.description: Vinyls是一款以iOS设计准则打造的精美音乐播放器。没有复杂的用户账户或设置配置。你可以马上开始听你的音乐。你可以擦拭寻找，看音臂跟随播放时间。
localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音乐播放器

localize.description: Vinyls是一款以iOS設計準則打造的精美音樂播放器。沒有複雜的用戶賬戶或設置配置。你可以馬上開始聽你的音樂。你可以擦拭尋找，看音臂跟隨播放時間。
localize.tagline: iOS上的一款精美的音樂播放器
